title: Athletics at the 2019 Pan American Games – Men's triple jump
text:
The men's <a href="triple%20jump">triple jump</a> competition of the <a href="Track%20and%20field">athletics</a> events at the <a href="2019%20Pan%20American%20Games">2019 Pan American Games</a> took place on the 10 of August at the 2019 Pan American Games Athletics Stadium. The <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%202015%20Pan%20American%20Games%20%E2%80%93%20%20Men%27s%20triple%20jump">defending</a> <a href="Pan%20American%20Games">Pan American Games</a> champion is <a href="Pedro%20Pablo%20Pichardo">Pedro Pablo Pichardo</a> from <a href="Cuba">Cuba</a>.
